alert.note: Alert for Benton (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 21 at 9:46AM PST until December 21 at 5:33PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oregon... Luckiamute River near Suver affecting Polk and Benton Counties. Pudding River at Aurora affecting Clackamas and Marion Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oregon... Marys River near Philomath affecting Benton County. For the Willamette River Tributaries...including Philomath, Suver, Aurora...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Marys River near Philomath. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Above 20.5 feet. In south Corvallis, a trailer park and light industrial areas may be flooded. Flooding may begin in the vicinity of Chapel Drive and Grange Hall Road on the south side of Philomath. Problems with the sewers have historically begun in Philomath at this and higher stages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM PST Tuesday the stage was 20.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM PST Tuesday was 21.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early this afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Use caution when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 545 PM PST.
